name: Remould
flavor: Reshape limbs as you see fit.

purposeDescriptions.low: allows the caster to make small temporary adjustments to the shape and properties of target Flesh of a Flesh caster, with focus
purposeDescriptions.mid: allows the caster to temporarily reshape target Flesh of a Flesh caster as if clay, with focus
purposeDescriptions.high: allows the caster to play god with target Flesh of a Flesh caster, up to and including extruding new temporary limbs, with focus
